TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Glyph extends System.Object

Docs.summary: 表示一个由 管理的用户界面 (UI) 实体。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 的唯一用途<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>是绘制和命中测试。 没有窗口句柄 (HWND), 因为它是在的装饰器窗口控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>上呈现的。 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> 每<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>个都可以<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>有与之关联的。 成功的命中测试<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>可将新的或不同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>的推送到的行为堆栈<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>中。
有关详细信息, 请参阅[行为服务概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c60cc41-4324-46b5-b444-b39eda7cb33f)。
## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建自己<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>的与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>关联的类。 此代码示例是为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>类提供的更大示例的一部分。
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/cpp/Form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/CS/Form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/VB/Form1.vb#5)]

Public MustOverride Function GetHitTest (p As Point) As Cursor

Docs.returns: 如果 与 关联，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 方法是强制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>实现提供命中测试逻辑的方法。`abstract` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.GetHitTest%2A> 给定任意点时, 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>已决定将此位置涉及到该位置, 则需要返回有效<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor>的。 否则, 返回`null`将<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>导致忽略位置。
## Examples 下面的示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.GetHitTest%2A> , 以查看该点是否在此标志符号内。 此代码示例是为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>类提供的更大示例的一部分。
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/cpp/Form1.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/CS/Form1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/VB/Form1.vb#9)]
